text: TVOKids (stylized as tvokids) is the brand for most of the children's programming aired by TVO (formerly TVOntario) in Canada. It was launched on April 1, 1994, and runs from 6:00 a.m. to 7:00 p.m. daily, the program aimed at 2-to-11-years-old children. ==Programs== * Arthur (January 6, 1997—present) * Galapagos X (November 25, 2023―present) * PAW Patrol (August 27, 2013―present) * Wild Kratts (January 11, 2011―present) ===Former=== * Bob the Builder (2006―2008) * WordGirl (September 3, 2007―September 6, 2020) ==External links== * Website * Preschool * School age Category:1990s establishments Category:1990s establishments in Canada Category:1994 establishments Category:1994 establishments in Canada Category:Canadian television networks Category:Companies based in Toronto Category:Television networks
title: TVOKids
